column1: Kata Robata////If you want to save money at lunch
column2: get something off the lunch menu. My last lunch visit
column4: it came out to be $100 (no alcohol). We were quite full (as much as you can be full off of sushi) with one lunch combo
column6: and 3-4 rolls. MMM DELISH. You'll be fine ordering only off of the lunch menu and drinking water. ;)
